title: workshops
carousel: The next edition of Let's talk about IT will take place on November 6th in Rzesz√≥w. We invite you! Join us to rock IT!
galleryText: See what happened during the workshops:
galleryDescription: This button will redirect you to the photo gallery from the Let's talk about IT workshops. You will find photos taken by our photographers who captured the best moments of the event.
opisGalerii: You have reached the photo gallery from the Let's talk about IT workshops. Here you will find photos taken by our photographers who captured the best moments of the event. By browsing the gallery, you can feel the atmosphere of the meeting, see the speakers, participants, and unique moments that made this event unforgettable. We hope that the photos will evoke pleasant memories and inspire you to participate in future workshops of Let's talk about IT! We invite you to browse the gallery and share your favorite moments from the event! Clicking on any photo will open it in a larger view.
kliknijAbyZobaczyc: Click on the photo to see it enlarged.
